mapper.select: SELECT /* CommunityUploadMapper.selectUpldInfo */ upload_seq /* 자료실일련번호 */ , upload_title /* 자료실주제 */ , upload_contents /* 자료실내용 */ , attached_file_path /* 첨부파일경로 */ , hit_cnt /* 조회수 */ , recmd_cnt /* 추천수 */ , TO_CHAR(cret_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS cret_dt /* 생성일시 */ , TO_CHAR(cret_dt, 'HH24:MI') AS cret_tm /* 생성시간 */ , fn_get_mbr_nm(cretr_id) AS cretr_nm /* 생성자명 */ FROM cmnt_upload /* 자료실TABLE */ WHERE upload_seq = #{uploadSeq}

SELECT /* CommunityUploadMapper.selectUpldPrevInfo */ upload_seq /* 자료실일련번호 */ , upload_title /* 자료실주제 */ FROM cmnt_upload /* 자료실TABLE */ WHERE upload_seq > #{uploadSeq} AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY upload_seq ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT /* CommunityUploadMapper.selectUpldCount */ COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM cmnt_upload upl /* 자료실TABLE */ WHERE upl.del_yn = 'N'

SELECT /* CommunityUploadMapper.selectUpldList */ upl.upload_seq /* 자료실일련번호 */ , upl.upload_title /* 자료실주제 */ , upl.upload_contents /* 자료실내용 */ , upl.attached_file_path /* 첨부파일경로 */ , upl.hit_cnt /* 조회수 */ , upl.recmd_cnt /* 추천수 */ , TO_CHAR(upl.cret_dt, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS cret_dt /* 생성일시 */ FROM cmnt_upload upl /* 자료실TABLE */ WHERE upl.del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY upl.upload_seq DESC OFFSET #{rowIdx} LIMIT #{rowCnt}

if.test: schTpCd != null and schTpCd != '' and schKwd != null and schKwd != ''

mapper.update: UPDATE /* CommunityUploadMapper.updateUpldHitCntPlus */ cmnt_upload SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE upload_seq = #{uploadSeq}
